definitions: a plant of the milkweed family, the follicles of which suggest a swallow with outstretched wings, often becoming a weed.

notes.text: Several species in the family Asclepiadaceae, in particular the black swallowwort (Cynanchum or 'Vincetoxicum' nigrum)

shortDefinitions: plant of milkweed family, follicles of which suggest swallow with outstretched wings

definitions: the greater celandine, formerly believed to be used by swallows to restore their sight.
shortDefinitions: greater celandine, formerly believed to be used by swallows to restore their sight
